page.title: 10Before Treowen
page.content:
Before I lived in Treowen I lived in Glasgow.I lived in a high block of flats.Boys used to smash milk bottles in the street.There was a lot of glass around.
I now live in Treowen.I have lived there for four years.Before that I lived in Barmouth.Before Barmouth I I lived in a village in Vietnam.I went from there to Hong Kong.I lived in Hong Kong for one year.
The place I now live in is called Treowen estate.Before I lived in Maesydail and before that in Morcambe in a hotel.I can always remember when I had breakfast with the residents the waitress said tea or coffee and I always said squash.
